page.title: 11EAGLE LODGE
page.content: EAGLE LODGE IS RUN BY THE LINCOLNSHIRE COUNTY COUNCIL.EAGLE LODGE WAS ORIGINALLY BUILT AS A HOTEL BUT WAS CONVERTED INTO A REST HOME.THE LODGE TAKES 45 RESIDENTS IN ALL.IT HAS 6 SINGLE ROOMS AND 2 COMMONARY ROOMS WHICH HAVE 4 BEDS IN.THE LODGE ALLOWS THE RESIDENTS TO GO SHOPPING AND TO GO TO THE PUB.ALSO MANY LOCAL GROUPS IN WOODHALL SPA GO TO ENTERTAIN THE OLD PEOPLE SUCH AS CHOIRS AND CHAPEL GROUPS.THE RESIDENTS ARE GIVEN 7 POUNDS A WEEK AND THE REST OF THEIR PENSION GOES TO THE RATE-PAYERS.THERE ARE FOUR NIGHT STAFF AND A CHOROPIDIST VISITS EVERY MONTH.
